app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Crait Secure Communication
app_description: What is Crait Crait is where secure communication and collaboration happens. It is a secure messaging tool designed to make working life easier and more productive for work groups. Why Crait The simple answer is: Businesses need to protect their digital assets. Businesses are targets and will be targets of cyber hacking because they have information valuable to would be criminals. No sector of corporate America is excluded from the threat of cyber hacking. This is why at Crait we believe that business communication deserves a security upgrade. What Crait provides Secure one on one or group calls and can support chats with up to 1000 people. Messages that self destruct after the messages are read. End to end encryption between the sender s device and the recipient such that the encryption key never leaves the device no party in the middle. Secure chat voice as well as file sharing capabilities to work groups. Secure email for Crait to Crait users. Pro edition service Length of subscription: one month Price: 2.99 per month Payment: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Turned off: Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period Auto renewal: Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal Account management: Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase Privacy policy: https: www.craitapp.com useragreement.php Payment terms of use: https: www.craitapp.com permission index.html agreement Auto renewal terms of use: https: www.craitapp.com permission index.html renewagreement
